folder: Westervelt Avenue & Scribner Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
St. George, Staten Island: Viewing northeastward across the lower end of St. George from 389 Westervelt Avenue, at Scribner Avenue. In the foreground is Sherman Avenue; in the left background, the Brighton Heights Reformed Church; in the center background, the Richmond Borough Hall.

About November 1, 1926

P. L. Sperr

A3 - NEG # 3611 (VIEW 2)

View v: September 7, 1935

folder: Westervelt Avenue & Scribner Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
St. George, Staten Island: Looking eastward across the lower part of St. George and the Upper New York Bay as seen from 389 Westervelt Avenue, at the head of Scribner Avenue. The clock tower is that of Public School No. 16 on Daniel Low Terrace. On the extreme right are piers and warehouses of the American Dock Company and across the bay is the skyline of Kings County (Brooklyn). View 3 is in a more southerly direction and shows the north slope of Pavilion Hill.

About November 1, 1926
Views 1, 2, 3

P. L. Sperr

View 1 Neg. # 3845

folder: Westervelt Avenue & Scribner Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
Westervelt Avenue, south from Scribner Avenue to Victory Boulevard. In the background is Pavillion Hill.

June 11, 1927

P. L. Sperr
